description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_PROTECT} take 50% less damage.
name: Protected

description: {CONDNAME_BUFF_SAVAGE} creatures have an additional, independent chance to deal critical damage with attacks.
name: Savage

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_SPLASH} deal 50% of their damage to enemies adjacent to the target they {ACTION_attack}.
name: Splashing

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_WARD} cannot lose stats.
name: Warded

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_AGILE} have an additional, independent chance to dodge attacks.
name: Agile

description: When an {CONDNAME_BUFF_ARCANE} creature {ACTION_casts} a spell, the spell does not consume any {STAT_charges}. Then, this buff is removed.
name: Arcane

description: {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} absorbs a certain amount of damage. After the maximum amount of damage is dealt, the buff is removed. {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} strength cannot exceed 200% of a creature's highest stat when this buff is applied.
name: Barrier

description: {CONDNAME_BUFF_PROFICIENT} creatures gain 30% more benefits from their Artifact's Stat Slots.
name: Proficient

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_DEFENSIVE} automatically {ACTION_defend} at the end of their turn.
name: Defensive

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_TAUNT} automatically {ACTION_provoke} at the end of their turn.
name: Taunting

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_LEECH} recover {STAT_health} equal to 25% of the damage they deal.
name: Leeching

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND} recover 30% {STAT_health} at the start of their turn.
name: Mending

description: {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE} creatures cannot be manually targeted by enemy attacks or spells. This buff is removed after the creature takes an action.
name: Invisible

description: {CONDNAME_BUFF_SHELL} negates the next incoming attack or spell.
name: Shelled

description: {CONDNAME_BUFF_BERSERK} creatures deal 50% more damage.
name: Berserk

description: {CONDNAME_BUFF_REPELLING} creatures have a 50% chance to ignore damage from spells.
name: Repelling

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT} cannot be healed and take damage from healing effects equal to 50% of the effect.
name: Blighted

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIND} creatures cannot choose their targets when {ACTION_attacking} or {ACTION_casting} single-target spells.
name: Blind

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED} take damage based on the inflictor's {STAT_intelligence} each turn.
name: Burning

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED} creatures have a 50% chance to {ACTION_attack} or {ACTION_cast} harmful spells on their allies.
name: Confused

description: When creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED} deal damage with attacks or spells, they take damage equal to 100% of their target's {STAT_attack}.
name: Cursed

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN} creatures are unable to act until they thaw, and have a 25% chance to thaw at the start of their turn. This chance doubles after each of their turns.
name: Frozen

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON} take damage based on the inflictor's {STAT_attack} each turn.
name: Poisoned

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} cannot attack. Overwrites {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}.
name: Scorned

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE} cannot cast spells. Overwrites {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}.
name: Silenced

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP} cannot act until they either take damage or this debuff wears off.
name: Sleeping

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SNARED} are stuck at the bottom of the {TIMELINE} until they break free. They have a 10% chance to break free at the start of each creature's turn.
name: Snared

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE} cannot dodge or deal critical damage.
name: Stone

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_VULNERABLE} creatures take 50% more damage.
name: Vulnerable

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_WEAK} creatures deal 50% less damage.
name: Weak

description: At the start of a creature's turn, its {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} detonates, dealing damage to the creature equal to 80% of the afflictor's {STAT_speed}. Then, this debuff is removed.
name: Bomb

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_DISARMED} creatures lose the benefits from their equipped Artifact, other than {STAT_health}.
name: Disarmed

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FEAR} creatures cannot gain stats.
name: Feared

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED} take damage equal to 30% of their Current {STAT_health} at the start of each turn.
name: Bleeding

description: When the {CONDNAME_MINION_ANIMATEDWEAPON}'s master {ACTION_attacks}, it deals additional damage equal to the highest total stat from all of its Artifact's Stat Slots.
name: Animated Weapon

description: After {CONDNAME_MINION_CONQUEST}'s master manually {ACTION_casts} a spell, it grants all your creatures a random buff.
name: Conquest

description: At the start of {CONDNAME_MINION_DEATH}'s master's turn, it has a chance to kill the enemy with the lowest {STAT_health}. The chance is increased based on how low the enemy's {STAT_health} is.
name: Death

description: After {CONDNAME_MINION_FAMINE}'s master {ACTION_attacks}, it decreases the target's Maximum {STAT_health} by an amount equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
name: Famine

description: After {CONDNAME_MINION_WAR}'s master is damaged, it deals damage to the enemy equal to 50% of the damage taken.
name: War

description: After the {CONDNAME_MINION_GUARDIANOFSURATHLI}'s master is killed, it is resurrected with 100% {STAT_health} and receives a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} that absorbs damage equal to 100% of its Health. Then, this minion disappears.
name: Guardian of Surathli

description: This {CONDNAME_MINION_ILLUSION}'s master's post-action effects (on-attack, on-cast, and so on) activate 2 additional times.
name: Illusion

description: L_CDESC_MINION_INNERDEMONS
name: Inner Demons

description: {CONDNAME_MINION_LITTLETORUN} SHOOTS LASERS AND !@#$.
name: Torun Junior

description: This minion's master has 5% more stats for each {CONDNAME_MINION_UNSTABLEHORROR} it has. After this minion's master {ACTION_defends} or {ACTION_provokes}, it deals damage to all enemies equal to 10% of its master's highest stat for each stack of {CONDNAME_MINION_UNSTABLEHORROR} it has. Maximum of 9 stacks.
name: Unstable Horror

description: After this minion's master takes damage from an enemy, each of its {CONDNAME_MINION_SPIDERLING} explode, dealing damage to the enemy equal to 50% of the master's Current {STAT_health}. Maximum of 9 stacks.
name: Spiderlings

description: After this minion's master takes damage from an attack or spell, each {CONDNAME_MINION_WRITHELING} afflicts a random enemy with a random debuff. Maximum of 5 stacks.
name: Writhelings

description: At the start of this minion's master's turn, each {CONDNAME_MINION_ZOMBIE} deals damage to a random enemy equal to 50% of its {STAT_attack}. Maximum of 9 stacks.
name: Zombies

description: After this minion's master attacks, each {CONDNAME_MINION_DIREWOLF} deals damage to the target equal to 30% of its {STAT_speed}. Maximum of 5 stacks.
name: Dire Wolves

description: The {CONDNAME_MINION_DOPPELGANGER}'s master has a 25% chance to take an extra turn.
name: Doppelganger

description: After the {CONDNAME_MINION_ANIMATEDGEM}'s master manually {ACTION_casts} a spell, this minion {ACTION_casts} one of its master's Spell Gems as well, chosen randomly.
name: Animated Gem

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_IMMUNITY} can't be afflicted with debuffs.
name: Immune

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_REBIRTH} are resurrected with 50% {STAT_health} when they die.
name: Rebirth

description: {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_INVERTED} creatures heal enemies instead of damaging them with attacks and spells, and damage allies instead of healing them. This debuff is removed after enough damage or healing has been done to offset its potency.
name: Inverted

description: After the {CONDNAME_MINION_AMALGAMATION}'s master deals damage with an attack or spell, this minion deals damage to a random enemy equal to 5% of its master's highest stat multiplied by the number of minions it has.
name: Amalgamation

description: At the end of this minion's master's turn, each {CONDNAME_MINION_MICROBOT} deals damage to a random enemy equal to 50% of its {STAT_intelligence}. Maximum of 9 stacks.
name: Microbots

description: When {CONDNAME_MINION_MAMMON}'s master takes damage, the damage is reduced by 2% for each stack of each Lesser Demon it has. This minion is a Greater Demon.
name: Mammon

description: When {CONDNAME_MINION_LEVIATHAN}'s master kills an enemy, it gains 5 stacks of each Lesser Demon. This minion is a Greater Demon.
name: Leviathan

description: When {CONDNAME_MINION_BEELZEBUB}'s master kills an enemy, it gains a random Greater Demon. This minion is a Greater Demon.
name: Beelzebub

description: When {CONDNAME_MINION_BELPHEGOR}'s master {ACTION_casts} a single-target spell, it targets all the creatures fighting on the target's side. This minion is a Greater Demon.
name: Belphegor

description: When {CONDNAME_MINION_ASMODEUS}' master {ACTION_attacks}, it always deals critical damage, cannot be dodged, and damages all other enemies for 50% less damage. This minion is a Greater Demon.
name: Asmodeus

description: At the end of {CONDNAME_MINION_SATANACHIA}'s master's turn, it {ACTION_casts} the last 3 spells creatures {ACTION_cast} in the current battle. This minion is a Greater Demon.
name: Satanachia

description: At the start of {CONDNAME_MINION_LUCIFER}'s master's turn, it {ACTION_attacks} random enemies 3 times. This minion is a Greater Demon.
name: Lucifer

description: When this minion's master {ACTION_attacks}, it sacrifices each {CONDNAME_MINION_BRIMFIEND} to increase its damage by 50% per stack. Maximum of 9 stacks. This minion is a Lesser Demon.
name: Brim Fiends

description: When this minion's master {ACTION_casts} a spell, it sacrifices each {CONDNAME_MINION_FIREIMP} to increase its potency by 30% per stack. Maximum of 9 stacks. This minion is a Lesser Demon.
name: Fire Imps

description: After this minion's master {ACTION_defends} or {ACTION_provokes}, it sacrifices each {CONDNAME_MINION_CHAOSSATYR} to deal damage to enemies equal to 15% of its highest stat per stack. Maximum of 9 stacks. This minion is a Lesser Demon.
name: Chaos Satyrs

description: Creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA} take damage at the end of their turn equal to 3% of the {STAT_health} all creatures had recovered when this debuff was applied.
name: Mania
